MonsterTrait.Name: Roleplaying Information
MonsterTrait.Text:
An acolyte of Torm, Sirac grew up on the streets of Suzail, the capital of Cormyr. He came to Icewind Dale to become a knucklehead trout fishe but instead found religion. The misbegotten son of Artus Climber, a renowened human adventurer, Sirac hasn't seen his father since he was a baby.
Ideal: "Without duty or loyalty, a man is nothing." Bond: "Icewind Dale is where i belong for the rest of my life." Flaw: "I am honest to a fault."

MonsterAction.Name: Shortsword
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6+3) piercing damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Dart
MonsterAction.Text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4+3) piercing damage. Sirac carries six darts.

MonsterTrait.Name: Parry
MonsterTrait.Text: Sirac adds 2 to his AC against on melee attack that would hit him. To do so, Sirac must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.
